#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		int sum=0,temp;
		if(n&1)
		{
			temp=n/2;
			sum=(temp*(temp+1));
		}
		else
	   {	
		temp=(n-1)/2;
		sum=(temp*(temp+1))+n/2;
		}
		printf("%d\n",sum);
	}
	return 0;
}
